response:
"was denken sie dazu, dass wir unsere personenbezogenen informationen immer weiter aussetzen müssen? sind wir bewusst, dass wir unsere daten privat halten können? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #digitalisierung"

translation: "what do you think about the fact that we have to share our personal information more and more? are we aware that we can keep our data private? #dataprivacy #privacy #digitalization"

this post encourages other users to think critically about the amount of personal information they share online and whether they are aware of their ability to control their digital privacy. by using the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #digitalisierung (digitalization), the post also reaches a wider audience interested in these topics.
